text.0: the pressers from the somapress send forth thy juice for rapturous joy.
text.1: the speckled sap runs like a flood.
text.2: with strength we follow through the sieve him who brings might and wins the kine.
text.3: enrobed in water with his juice.
text.4: pour on the sieve the soma neer subdued in waters waterless.
text.5: and make it pure for indras drink.
text.6: moved by the purifiers thought the soma flows into the sieve.
text.7: by wisdom it hath gained its home.
text.8: with humble homage indra have the somadrops flowed forth to thee.
text.10: purified in his fleecy garb attaining every beauty he.
text.12: swelling as twere to heights of heaven the stream of the creative juice.
text.13: falls lightly on the cleansing sieve.
text.14: thus soma purifying himwho knoweth song mid living men.
text.15: thou wanderest through the cloth of wool.
